sentences.en: Some recent wildfires are among the biggest ever in California in terms of acreage burned, according to state figures and news reports.
sentences.cn: 根据州数据和新闻报道，就燃烧面积而言，最近的野火是加州有史以来最严重的几次野火。

sentences.en: He has sown coffee on part of his acreage.
sentences.cn: 他在部分自家耕地上种下了咖啡。

sentences.en: About 70% of the cocoa acreage is treated with insecticide.
sentences.cn: 大约70%的可可豆种植区都用杀虫剂处理过。
